Description: Textile fragment; torn strip of undyed linen cloth used as a mummy-wrapping; deterioration of edges due to contact with black bitumen(?). Side edges torn, ends cut. The weave is plain [warp-faced simple tabby] and the threads are S-spun and S-spliced; the stitch gauge is warp c.29 ends per 10mm and weft c.12 picks per 10mm.
Curator's comments: Probably from the same cloth as BM 6548. Information from Hero Granger-Taylor [1993]
